name: Word Imposter
description:
Can you find the imposter and guess the correct word?

Look at 4 photos or 4 words and find the one that doesn't belong in the group. Easy enough, right? But wait, your job is not done yet! Now you need to guess the word that describes what these 3 clues have in common. Sometimes you see it right away, sometimes the answer is not that obvious. Try to find these words and solve all levels! You can tap any picture to zoom in for a closer look. If you like quiz and word games, you'll enjoy this fantastic brain teaser.

FEATURES:
• Less typing, more fun!
• 400 puzzles or more
• Play in English, French, Russian, German, Portuguese, Italian or Spanish: a great tool if you're learning a foreign language

Try this simple and highly addictive game for the whole family! If you like pics and word association games, this puzzle is for you!
